mil3.4.5:1.3: ‘kinti imam dukkham nirujjheyya, annanca dukkham nuppajjeyyati.
mil3.4.5:1.5: Kim patikacceva vayamitena, nanu sampatte kale vayamitabban”ti?
mil3.4.5:1.7: “sampatte kale, maharaja, vayamo akiccakaro bhavati, patikacceva vayamo kiccakaro bhavati”ti.
mil3.4.5:2.2: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, yada tvam pipasito bhaveyyasi, tada tvam udapanam khanapeyyasi, talakam khanapeyyasi ‘paniyam pivissami’”ti?
mil3.4.5:2.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, sampatte kale vayamo akiccakaro bhavati, patikacceva vayamo kiccakaro bhavati”ti.
mil3.4.5:3.2: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, yada tvam bubhukkhito bhaveyyasi, tada tvam khettam kasapeyyasi, salim ropapeyyasi, dhannam atiharapeyyasi ‘bhattam bhunjissami’”ti?
mil3.4.5:3.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, sampatte kale vayamo akiccakaro bhavati, patikacceva vayamo kiccakaro bhavati”ti.
mil3.4.5:4.2: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, yada te sangamo paccupatthito bhaveyya, tada tvam parikham khanapeyyasi, pakaram karapeyyasi, gopuram karapeyyasi, attalakam karapeyyasi, dhannam atiharapeyyasi, tada tvam hatthismim sikkheyyasi, assasmim sikkheyyasi, rathasmim sikkheyyasi, dhanusmim sikkheyyasi, tharusmim sikkheyyasi”ti?
mil3.4.5:4.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, sampatte kale vayamo akiccakaro bhavati, patikacceva vayamo kiccakaro bhavati.
